page.title: 02THE SILO UNIT,TWYFORD.
page.content: CHERWELL VALLEY SILOS LTD A PRIVATE COMPANY WHO TRADE AND MANUFACTURE ANIMAL FEED.THERE ARE TWO DISTINCT OPERATIONS,THE SILO UNIT BEING HOUSED ON PART OF THE FARM GROUNDS. DALES TRANSPORT,A SUBSIDUARY,TRANSPORTT ALL MATERIALS. {THE FARM} COMPRISES OF 750 ACRES.OF THESE 400 ARE RENTED FROM EXETER COLL. OXFORD.THE REMAINING 350 ARE OWNED,BUT THIS INCLUDES 55 ACRES AT HELDOM. THUS THE PART OF THE FARM IN THE SECTOR COMPRISES 695 ACRES.THE FARM STATISTICS HOWEVER ARE FOR THE TOTAL 750 ACRES. {USE OF LAND} 560 TO CROPS,WHICH INCLUDE OIL SEED RAPE,WINTER WHEAT, WINTER BARLEY,SPRING WHEAT,SPRING PEAS, LUPINS (FOR FEED).117 TO GRASS.83 TO BUILDINGS,ROADS,WOODLAND-ROUGH PASTURE. A MANAGER,1 FULL-TIME WORKER AND 2 PART-TIME STUDENTS ARE EMPLOYED.
